description: '''The County Medical Examiners''' is an American [[goregrind]] band who, in their own words, exist for the sole purpose of recreating the sound of early [[Carcass (band)|Carcass]] albums. It was distinguished by a strange combination of Goregrind with elements of doom metal. The band is also known to do no live shows at all. All of the current members have graduated with an [[Doctor of Medicine|MD]] in medical school or are currently{{When|date=June 2025|reason=Timeframe unclear}} taking medical school classes, hence the name of the band.
